Ok, that inspired me. The events page should be fully up to date as of this point. If I missed something on it, someone tell me. As soon as the new login system is out, the site will be much more easilly updatable.

So far, I've planned the following for the new login script:

- Everything the current one offers.
- Members will be able to post fanfiction and fanart without having to go through the slow proccess of having me put it up.
- The council will be able to create polls and update the site.
- If KSL wants is fine with it, I can implement a member profile thing much like his NBWRPers site.

That's all for the moment. I think I forgot half of it though.




> --- In nbwrpg@y..., lordofdarkness11001@y... wrote:
> > hey everybody i will be making my own events page for this rpg on a 
> > new website
